title: How To Create a Free Website

metadata.title: W3Schools.com

metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: How TO - Create a Free Website
Build and host your website with W3Schools Spaces.
content.html: Build and host your website with W3Schools Spaces.

content.text: Get started with your free website in a few clicks.
content.html: Get started with your free website in a few clicks.

content.text: Everything you need right in the browser.
content.html: Everything you need right in the browser.

content.text: It is easy to use - try it!
content.html: It is easy to use - try it!

content.text: Create Your First Website with W3Schools Spaces
W3Schools Spaces is a personal place where you can build and experiment with code and host your own website.
content.html: W3Schools Spaces is a personal place where you can build and experiment with code and host your own website.

content.text: With W3Schools Spaces you can build with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
content.html: With W3Schools Spaces you can build with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

content.text: Edit code directly in your browser.
content.html: Edit code directly in your browser.

content.text: Upload and host your files and images.
content.html: Upload and host your files and images.

content.text: Start to grow your online presence today!
content.html: Start to grow your online presence today!

content.text: Why Build with W3Schools Spaces?
Spaces is made by web developers for web developers.
content.html: Spaces is made by web developers for web developers.

content.text: It is free to get started and you do not have to enter your credit card.
content.html: It is free to get started and you do not have to enter your credit card.

content.text: Edit and Preview Code
The editor is easy to use - which helps you to focus on the most imporant things.
content.html: The editor is easy to use - which helps you to focus on the most imporant things.

content.text: Check the responsiveness of your site with the different preview alternatives.
content.html: Check the responsiveness of your site with the different preview alternatives.

content.text: Preview changes on your site, live!
content.html: Preview changes on your site, live!

content.text: Build From Anywhere
Host your files and images in the cloud.
content.html: Host your files and images in the cloud.

content.text: Keep organized by creating a structure with folders.
content.html: Keep organized by creating a structure with folders.

content.text: Everything you need right in the browser.
content.html: Everything you need right in the browser.

content.text: Free Templates
Browse and use our responsive website templates.
content.html: Browse and use our responsive website templates.

content.text: Modify, save, share, and use them in your projects.
content.html: Modify, save, share, and use them in your projects.

content.text: The templates are powered by W3.CSS
content.html: The templates are powered by W3.CSS

content.text: What Do I Need to Know to Get Started?
HTML, CSS and JavaScript are the foundational languages to build a website.
content.html: HTML, CSS and JavaScript are the foundational languages to build a website.

content.text: Do not worry if you do not know how to code. The most important thing is to get hands on, early on. Learning how to code is best done with getting practical. Start to build something today!
content.html: Do not worry if you do not know how to code. The most important thing is to get hands on, early on. Learning how to code is best done with getting practical. Start to build something today!

content.text: Lets Get Started in a Few Steps
Do you already have a W3Schools Account? If so, skip the first step
content.html: Do you already have a W3Schools Account? If so, skip the first step

content.text: Step One: Sign Up For an Account
To be able to use Spaces you need to sign up and get your account.
content.html: To be able to use Spaces you need to sign up and get your account.

content.text: Lets get you set up!
content.html: Lets get you set up!

content.text: Go to W3Schools Profile - Click " Sign up " and enter your email and password, then click the " Sign up for free " button.
content.html: Go to W3Schools Profile - Click "Sign up" and enter your email and password, then click the "Sign up for free" button.

content.text: Remember to validate your account in your email. Check the spam filter if you cannot find the validation email in your inbox.
content.html: Remember to validate your account in your email. Check the spam filter if you cannot find the validation email in your inbox.

content.text: Get more information about how to sign up in our article - How to sign up
content.html: Get more information about how to sign up in our article - How to sign up

content.text: Step Two: Start with a template or HTML skeleton
Go to W3Schools Spaces
content.html: Go to W3Schools Spaces

content.text: Select one of the options and click the " Continue " button.
content.html: Select one of the options and click the "Continue" button.

content.text: Do not worry too much about this decision. You can reset your Space and start over again whenever you want.
content.html: Do not worry too much about this decision. You can reset your Space and start over again whenever you want.

content.text: Step Three: Give your space a name
Personalize your Space by giving it an amazing name.
content.html: Personalize your Space by giving it an amazing name.

content.text: You can not use special letters in the name, such as (#, ! or :). The only exception is dash ( - )
content.html: You can not use special letters in the name, such as (#, ! or :). The only exception is dash ( - )

content.text: The name will be the link that you share with others to see your site. For example: yourname .w3spaces.com
content.html: The name will be the link that you share with others to see your site. For example: yourname.w3spaces.com

content.text: Step Four: Enter your space
Great job! you made it to the dashboard.
content.html: Great job! you made it to the dashboard.

content.text: In the dashboard you get an overview of your spaces and usage.
content.html: In the dashboard you get an overview of your spaces and usage.

content.text: Enter your space and its File Overview by clicking somewhere on the space's row or click the button with the three dots to the right inside the row.
content.html: Enter your space and its File Overview by clicking somewhere on the space's row or click the button with the three dots to the right inside the row.

content.text: You can only have one space with the free plan. However, you can always upgrade to get more spaces.
content.html: You can only have one space with the free plan. However, you can always upgrade to get more spaces.

content.text: Step Five: Edit code or upload files
This is where the magic happens!
content.html: This is where the magic happens!

content.text: Start to edit code or upload files
content.html: Start to edit code or upload files

content.text: Step Six: Publish your site and share it with someone
This is the start of building your online presence.
content.html: This is the start of building your online presence.

content.text: Learn, test, build, and go live with your space.
content.html: Learn, test, build, and go live with your space.

content.text: Create your website and share it with others.
content.html: Create your website and share it with others.

links.text: How can I share my space?

content.text: Note: Your space name with the .w3spaces.com extension is your shareable link. Read more about how to share your space in this article How can I share my space?
content.html: Note: Your space name with the .w3spaces.com extension is your shareable link. Read more about how to share your space in this article How can I share my space?

content.text: W3Schools Spaces
W3Schools Spaces
Build your own website with W3Schools Spaces.
